content: Adjusted EBITDA grew 11% to $16.4 million, in line with our expectation as we ramped our planned investments in go-to-market and innovation efforts in the first quarter. Adjusted EBITDA in the quarter was $16.4 million, up 11% versus the prior year and reflects the ramping of these organic investments in the quarter, along, with Paragon. Your line is open.
